allow:
Bash(ruby -e '
require ""xcodeproj""

project_path = ""CardSampleGame.xcodeproj""
project = Xcodeproj::Project.open\(project_path\)

# Find the main target
target = project.targets.find { |t| t.name == ""CardSampleGame"" }

# Find the Engine/Data/Providers group
providers_group = project.main_group.find_subpath\(""Engine/Data/Providers"", true\)

# Add the new file
file_path = ""Engine/Data/Providers/TwilightMarchesContentProvider.swift""
file_ref = providers_group.new_reference\(file_path.split\(""/""\).last\)
file_ref.set_source_tree\(""<group>""\)

# Add to target
target.add_file_references\([file_ref]\)

project.save
puts ""Added TwilightMarchesContentProvider.swift to project""
')
